content:
abrown opened PR #7642 from abrown:pku-dedup-docs to bytecodealliance:main:

This change deduplicates some module documentation the pooling allocator. Previously, the module-level documentation for pooling.rs and memory_pool.rs had duplicated content which this change removes. It also takes a stab at clarifying "how" and "why" MPK is used for memory pooling.

<!--

  • If this work has been discussed elsewhere, please include a link to that

  • Explain why this change is needed. If the details are in an issue already,
    this can be brief.
